instruction: Follow-up for COPD management; patient concerned about potential long-term side effects of prednisone therapy.

attributes.comment: COPD management follow-up; concerns about prednisone side effects

instruction: Patient notes marked improvement in breathing while on a short course of prednisone with only a few doses remaining; expresses worry—prompted by spouse—about long-term prednisone effects. Denies difficulty using tiotropium inhaler but experiences occasional mild jitteriness. No additional inhalers used; wife assists with medication administration.

attributes.narrative: Patient notes marked improvement in breathing while on a short course of prednisone with only a few doses remaining, expresses spouse-prompted concern about long-term prednisone effects, denies difficulty using tiotropium inhaler but reports occasional mild jitteriness, uses no additional inhalers and receives assistance with medication administration from wife.

instruction: Complete the remaining few days of the current prednisone course, then continue tiotropium inhaler for COPD maintenance; monitor for worsening jitteriness and report if bothersome; avoid starting any additional inhalers unless advised.

attributes.comment: Complete the remaining few days of the current prednisone course, then continue tiotropium inhaler for COPD maintenance; monitor for worsening jitteriness and report if bothersome; avoid starting any additional inhalers unless advised.
